anyOf.description: Represents a time of day (24h time, not 12h am/pm). Set both to the same number for any time. If they are both set to -1, it will always be not allowed.

startHour.description:
startHour
The beginning hour. Set both to the same number for any time. If they are both set to -1, it will always be not allowed.
   
Number

    
* Default Value is 0.0

endHour.description:
endHour
The ending hour. Set both to the same number for any time. If they are both set to -1, it will always be not allowed.
   
Number

    
* Default Value is 0.0
